prod_short_desc: Intercept The Shocker and take down the Vulture!
prod_long_desc:
Team up with Spider-Man and Iron Man to catch up with The Shocker’s Van and tackle the Vulture’s attacks in this thrilling LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes Beware the Vulture set. The Shocker’s Van opens up for easy play and includes a mounted, adjustable 6-stud rapid shooter, a buildable rifle and buildable tech egg, while Vulture’s wings have 2 detachable stud shooters. Includes 4 minifigures with assorted weapons and accessory elements such as Spider-Man’s firing Power Blasts.
Includes 4 minifigures: Spider-Man, Vulture, Iron Man and The Shocker.
The Shocker’s van opens up for easy play and includes a mounted, adjustable 6-stud rapid shooter, 2 opening crates (1 with the buildable stolen tech egg and 1 with ammo) and a buildable rifle, plus a minifigure driver’s cabin with lift-off roof.
Vulture’s wings are attachable to the Vulture minifigure and feature 2 detachable stud shooters (which can also be held by a minifigure).
Weapons include Spider-Man’s 3 Power Blasts and The Shocker’s 2 power fists.
Accessory elements include Spider-Man’s smartphone, web and web string, and Iron Man’s boosters for his feet and hands.
Attach the Power Blast elements to Spider-Man’s hands and push inwards to fire!
Place Spider-Man’s smartphone in his web and pretend to film all the action.
All 4 included minifigures are new for June 2017.
Van measures over 2” high, 5” long and 2” wide.
Vulture’s wings measure over 2” high, 7” long and 1” (2.5cm) wide.
